Name: LCB Cocktail
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A sweet and sour, citrus fresh cocktail.
History: Created in 2004 by yours truly and named after Lisa Clare Ball, a fan of both Sauvignon Blanc wine and pink grapefruit juice.
Nutrition: One serving of LCB Cocktail contains 199 calories
